languages.text: "В пекло, в пекло! От таких грехов да в одном еретике искры будут — чисто звездопад!" {n}За гнусной шуткой скомороха следует хохот толпы, предвкушающей зрелище.{/n}

"The furnace? The furnace! All those scandalous misdeeds in one heretic will make oh-such-lovely sparks! Behold the starfall!" {n}The fool's slimy joke is followed by laughter as the crowd anticipates the coming spectacle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В пекло, в пекло! От таких грехов да в одном еретике искры будут — чисто звездопад!" {n}За гнусной шуткой скомороха следует хохот толпы, предвкушающей зрелище.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The furnace? The furnace! Such sins in a heretic would make oh-so-lovely sparks! Behold the starfall!" {n}The jester's ribald joke is followed by the laughter of the crowd anticipating the spectacle.{/n}

languages.text: “熔炉？熔炉！这么邪恶的异端分子，犯下了那么多罪行，一定会喷发出无数可爱的火花！欣赏群星陨落吧！”{n}小丑卑劣的笑话引起了哄堂大笑，人群期待着接下来的场面。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The furnace? The furnace! All those scandalous misdeeds in one heretic will make oh-such-lovely sparks! Behold the starfall!" {n}The fool's slimy joke is followed by laughter as the crowd anticipates the coming spectacle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “熔炉？熔炉！这么邪恶的异端分子，犯下了那么多罪行，一定会喷发出无数可爱的火花！欣赏群星陨落吧！”{n}小丑卑劣的笑话引起了哄堂大笑，人群期待着接下来的场面。{/n}

languages.text: «¿El horno? ¡El horno! ¡Todas esas escandalosas fechorías en un hereje para esparcir bonitas centellas! ¡Contemplad la lluvia de estrellas!». {n}La expectante muchedumbre recibe entre carcajadas la macabra chanza del bufón.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The furnace? The furnace! All those scandalous misdeeds in one heretic will make oh-such-lovely sparks! Behold the starfall!" {n}The fool's slimy joke is followed by laughter as the crowd anticipates the coming spectacle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿El horno? ¡El horno! ¡Todas esas escandalosas fechorías en un hereje para esparcir bonitas centellas! ¡Contemplad la lluvia de estrellas!». {n}La expectante muchedumbre recibe entre carcajadas la macabra chanza del bufón.{/n}

languages.text: "Fırın mı? Fırın! Bu kâfirin skandal suçları ne güzel kıvılcımlar çaktıracak! Yıldızın düşüşünü izleyin!" {n}Soytarının yılışık şakasını, kalabalık yaklaşan temaşayı beklerken kahkahalar takip ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The furnace? The furnace! All those scandalous misdeeds in one heretic will make oh-such-lovely sparks! Behold the starfall!" {n}The fool's slimy joke is followed by laughter as the crowd anticipates the coming spectacle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Fırın mı? Fırın! Bu kâfirin skandal suçları ne güzel kıvılcımlar çaktıracak! Yıldızın düşüşünü izleyin!" {n}Soytarının yılışık şakasını, kalabalık yaklaşan temaşayı beklerken kahkahalar takip ediyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「火刑？火刑！異端者のすべての恥ずべき悪行がきっと素晴らしい火花を散らすことだろう！星が降ってくるのを見逃すな！」{n}道化の陰険な冗談に、群衆が来たる光景を期待して、笑いが起きる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The furnace? The furnace! All those scandalous misdeeds in one heretic will make oh-such-lovely sparks! Behold the starfall!" {n}The fool's slimy joke is followed by laughter as the crowd anticipates the coming spectacle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「火刑？火刑！異端者のすべての恥ずべき悪行がきっと素晴らしい火花を散らすことだろう！星が降ってくるのを見逃すな！」{n}道化の陰険な冗談に、群衆が来たる光景を期待して、笑いが起きる。{/n}

languages.text: « Le brasier ? Le brasier ! Tous ces méfaits scandaleux réunis au sein d'un seul hérétique s'envoleront en gerbes d'étincelles crépitantes ! Oh, le beau feu d'artifice ! » {n}La plaisanterie obséquieuse du bouffon suscite les rires de la foule réjouie à la perspective du spectacle à venir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The furnace? The furnace! All those scandalous misdeeds in one heretic will make oh-such-lovely sparks! Behold the starfall!" {n}The fool's slimy joke is followed by laughter as the crowd anticipates the coming spectacle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Le brasier ? Le brasier ! Tous ces méfaits scandaleux réunis au sein d'un seul hérétique s'envoleront en gerbes d'étincelles crépitantes ! Oh, le beau feu d'artifice ! » {n}La plaisanterie obséquieuse du bouffon suscite les rires de la foule réjouie à la perspective du spectacle à venir.{/n}

languages.text: "Der Ofen? Der Ofen! All die skandalösen Missetaten in einem einzigen Ketzer machen so wunderhübsche Funken! Bestaunet den Sternenfall!" {n}Die widerliche Bemerkung des Narren wird von großem Gelächter quittiert. Die Menge kann das Spektakel kaum erwarten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The furnace? The furnace! All those scandalous misdeeds in one heretic will make oh-such-lovely sparks! Behold the starfall!" {n}The fool's slimy joke is followed by laughter as the crowd anticipates the coming spectacle.{/n}
